channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
I am new to this privet server i have downloaded moparscape and i dunno how to play can someone tell me how to join peoples servers and not get logged out all the time ive read all the guilds and tutorials please help
HELP MEEEEE please!

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @noob12345678 noob12345678
item.description:
@noob12345678 wrote:

once you are on the moparscape clientscreen. click help. then click server status page .search for a scape that you would want to go on. copy the ip adress and port. then log in

Read full topic
